item.title: Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian Let’s agree on one thing: Obsidian is easily one of the best choices you can make when it comes to note-taking apps. Over the years, I’ve tried more note-taking apps than I can count — from good old Windows Notepad and Samsung Notes (back when it was still called S Note, I think!) all the way to Notion, MS Word, Apple Notes, and Pages. You name it, I’ve dabbled with it.
